# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2026-01-24

### Added
- Initial release of JSON Validator CLI
- Command-line interface for JSON validation
- JSON syntax validation with `validate` command
- JSON Schema validation support with `--schema` option
- Pretty-print JSON with `format` command
- Configurable indentation for formatting
- Clear error messages for invalid JSON
- Version command to display tool version
- Comprehensive README with usage examples
- Contributing guidelines for potential contributors
- MIT License
- Basic test suite with pytest
- GitHub Actions CI workflow for automated testing
- Package distribution setup via PyPI

### Features
- Support for Python 3.7+
- Integration with jsonschema library for schema validation
- User-friendly command-line interface with argparse
- Colorful output with checkmarks and error symbols
- Exit codes for scripting (0 for success, 1 for failure)

[0.1.0]: https://github.com/bijesh-bits/jsonvalidator/releases/tag/v0.1.0
